entry.string: Your account has not yet been activated. You need to finish these final steps in order to complete your registration.
entry.translation: Yuoor eccuoont hes nut yet beee ecteefeted. Bork bork bork! Yuoo need tu feenish zeese-a feenel steps in oorder tu cumplete-a yuoor regeestreshun.

entry.string: Please enter your username and validation code below
entry.translation: Pleese-a inter yuoor userneme-a und feleedeshun cude-a beloo

entry.string: Your validation code has been sent again.
entry.translation: Yuoor feleedeshun cude-a hes beee sent egeeen. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: If you did not receive your validation code, we will try to resend it now.
entry.translation: Iff yuoo deed nut receeefe-a yuoor feleedeshun cude-a, ve-a veell try tu resend it noo.
